name: Variable
description:
In a nutshell: A Variable is a concept in the dictionary and
is defined on a Domain. More
specifically: A Variable can be applied in different context;
it’s normally represented by a field in a Table. E.g. the Variable: Country can
be used in a table (Cube) referring to debtors (Country of the debtor) or in a
Cube referring to real estates (Country location of the real estate).
